mapper.select: SELECT * from p_goods where org_id=#{orgId} and is_online=1 and is_verfiy=2 order by sold_out desc limit 3
SELECT * from p_goods where org_id=#{orgId} and is_online=1 and is_verfiy=2 order by sold_out desc

SELECT A.*, B.code AS orderCode, B.ship_firm AS shipFirm, B.ship_code AS shipCode, B.state FROM p_goods A LEFT JOIN p_order B ON A.id = B.goods_id WHERE A.user_id = #{user_id} and B.is_del == 0 ORDER BY B.banance_time

select A.*, max(B.price) as myPrice from p_goods A left join p_goods_auction B on A.id = B.goods_id where B.user_id = #{user_id} and A.type = 2
order by B.create_time desc
select g.*, (CASE g.is_online WHEN 1 then '上架' WHEN 0 then '下架' ELSE '状态未知' END ) good_shelfDown, c.name cate_name from p_goods g LEFT JOIN p_pawn_cate c on g.cate_code = c.code where g.id = #{id}

SELECT g.*,po.name as orgName,po.introduction as orgIntroduction,po.org_logo as orgLogo from p_goods g LEFT join p_pawn_org po on g.org_id=po.id where 1=1
and g.name LIKE CONCAT('%','${name}','%')
and g.id=#{id}
and g.is_online = 1 and g.is_verfiy = 2 order by g.create_time desc

SELECT t.*, u.account goodsOwnerAccount, u.nick_name goodsOwnerNick, u.NAME goodsOwnerName FROM p_goods t LEFT JOIN b_user u ON t.goods_owner = u.id WHERE t.source IN ( 6, 7 )
and t.name like '%${goodsName}%'
ORDER BY t.create_time
